text: Zhu Xu (, April 15, 1930 â€“ September 15, 2018) was a Chinese actor. He was well known for his roles in Zhang Yang's Shower and Wu Tianming's The King of Masks. He was born in Shenyang. Zhu died on September 15, 2018 from mesothelioma in Beijing at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in China Category:Deaths from mesothelioma Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Actors from Beijing
title: Zhu Xu
